name: Shields Departure Factor (relative to target ?*)
functionStatement: Transport capacity is neither persistently under- nor over-capacity relative to bed material.
descriptionMarkdown: Departure factor from target Shields stress: M = max(?*bf/0.045, 0.045/?*bf). Lower is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compute ?*bf; compute departure factor from target value.

inputs.label: Shields Departure Factor (relative to target ?*)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Bankfull hydraulics + D50; target ?* (e.g., 0.045) for gravel beds.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Bankfull hydraulics + D50; target ?* (e.g., 0.045) for gravel beds.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Transport capacity is neither persistently under- nor over-capacity relative to bed material.
sourceMetadata.description: Departure factor from target Shields stress: M = max(?*bf/0.045, 0.045/?*bf). Lower is better.

referencesRaw: General gravel-bed transport guidance; SFARI rapid assessment (concept).

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Use alternative target ?* for sand-bed or boulder-bed systems.
